methods.name: I
javadoc: Returns the server's Minecraft version as string.

methods.name: J
javadoc: Returns the number of players currently on the server.

methods.name: K
javadoc: Returns the maximum number of players allowed on the server.

methods.name: L
javadoc: Returns an array of the usernames of all the connected players.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Handle a command received by an RCon instance

methods.name: d
javadoc: Never used, but "getServerPort" is already taken.

methods.name: q
javadoc: Returns the server message of the day

methods.name: t
javadoc: Used by RCon's Query in the form of "MajorServerMod 1.2.3: MyPlugin 1.3" AnotherPlugin 2.1" AndSoForth 1.0".
